snippet.title: Soft and Happy Jazz for Babies üé∂ A Comforting Musical Collection
snippet.description:
Today we‚Äôre happy to share this cozy collection of soft jazz pieces created especially for babies and their families. We wanted the music to feel warm, gentle, and soothing. The kind of sound that makes quiet moments even more peaceful and helps little ones feel safe and relaxed.

These pieces were put together with a lot of care, keeping in mind those tender everyday moments: cuddling on the couch, winding down after a long day, or simply filling the room with a calm, comforting atmosphere. Our hope is that this gentle jazz brings a sense of ease to your home and becomes a soft companion during your baby‚Äôs calm moments.

Thank you for inviting this music into your space. We hope it brings comfort, warmth, and a little bit of joy to you and your little one. üíõüé∑‚ú®

00:00¬†Rainy nap
03:25¬†You made me love you
05:36¬†Bee be big
09:55¬†Beale Street Blues
12:58¬†Crawling in the sky
16:17¬†Indian Summer
18:37¬†Elephant's dream
21:42¬†Oliver
24:25¬†Fare Thee Well
27:47¬†Poor butterfly
31:31¬†Find me
35:49¬†The Dino, the Lullaby and Paco
40:12¬†Lolaby
43:13¬†Whispering
45:09¬†Strolling around
48:55¬†Sunny Winter Seagull
51:53¬†Swinging morning
56:57¬†Unwrapping day
58:44¬†Rainy nap
01:02:09¬†You made me love you

‚ú¨ OUR LAST ALBUM  ‚ú¨

‚ú® Bach: Piano Lullabies ‚ú®

SPOTIFY : https://shorturl.at/0K6y4
AMAZON MUSIC: https://shorturl.at/YaQzI
DEEZER: https://shorturl.at/orpvz

‚ú¨ ABOUT US ‚ú¨

We are Mu Dimon and Rubio Faviere, the musicians behind Songs of Birdland. We record and produce all the music and videos you see in our own studio, with great dedication and a deep love for jazz and classical music. Every piece is an original creation made for all of you :)


‚ú¨ THANKS ‚ú¨

We are beyond excited and deeply grateful to have reached such an incredible milestone: 390,000 followers!

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your ongoing support. It means the world to us, and we can‚Äôt wait to share everything the future holds.
--

Remember like and subscribe now ‚ù§Ô∏è 
https://www.youtube.com/@songsofbirdland
